sqlMap.statement: SELECT MM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK , MM.SVC_MACH_MAINT_AVAL_FLG SVC_MACH_MAINT_AVAL_FLG FROM SVC_MACH_MSTR MM WHERE MM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MM.MDSE_CD = #mdseCd# AND MM.SER_NUM = #serNum# AND MM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT SS.SO_SER_PK SO_SER_PK FROM SO_SER SS WHERE SS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SS.SER_NUM = #serNum# AND SS.SO_NUM = #soNum# AND SS.SO_SLP_NUM = #soSlpNum# AND SS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
